html:
1.19.18  5:58 pm   Are some of your videos supposed to be satirical/ mockery of social matters?

      Because sometimes it seems like it, or are you just making music for fun??? :))))
1.19.18  5:06 pm   if u did "i'm gonna write a song on the count of 3" live, would you sing "no i ain't gonna find her in [city where you're playing]"?
1.19.18  5:05 pm   What do you think of you being a meme
1.19.18  4:51 pm   Why does your new song have "I heart Satan" in it?
1.19.18  4:42 pm   im kind of bummed you didnt mention sikhism in the history of the world
1.19.18  4:12 pm   surprise me please
1.19.18  3:53 pm   How much of the stuff that you put in to your videos is random stuff and how much means something?
1.19.18  3:46 pm   How do you like to show love
1.19.18  3:24 pm   Hey Bill :( I'm worried that I'll never be super duper good at the piano, but I want it more than anything. What's the best way to learn?

1.19.18  3:22 pm   Hey Bill :) At the end of your song "you're free to do whatever you want to" you say "you're free to do whatever you WON'T DO" but it sounds like maybe you could've actually been saying "want to" but you decided it sounded more like "won't do" so you went with that. Is that the case?

     Either way, I love everything you do
1.19.18  3:10 pm   thank you for making me experience lsd without lsd
1.19.18  2:47 pm   Will you do any more blue anagrams
1.19.18  1:38 pm   give me your merch
1.19.18  1:35 pm   5.11.16  4:06 pm Was that a triple negative?

1.19.18  1:25 pm   do you think a loop method is effective for productivity? like looping 10 seconds of a project and only working on that for like a week, then when it's perfect move onto the next 10 seconds until it's done
1.19.18  1:10 pm   1.18.18  3:44 pm what is the difference between meeting and greeting
1.19.18  12:58 pm   Why did you put a capital letter at the start of your last video (La de da de da de da de day oh) you have never done it before?

1.19.18  12:55 pm   Your songs are amazing! Why don't you why don't you try and putting it on itunes,

on itunes

      or even start making albums (:

1.19.18  12:53 pm   i just found out that the type of art i wanna make will take excruciatingly long to make, but i don't want to reduce the quality of the art just so i can release it sooner. AHHHHHHHHHH
1.19.18  12:47 pm   Do you think it's truly possible to translate your work?
1.19.18  12:06 pm   Hey, do you like D2/F# or F#-7(b13)
1.19.18  11:55 am   Why is ur music kind of a little ting minescule of a bit strange
1.19.18  10:59 am   what are you doing when you are bored?

1.19.18  9:22 am   Wow when i make a song i like i cant stop myself from listening to it over and over. It feels counterproductive and its probably not even good to anyone but myself but i love doin it
1.19.18  8:30 am   Ignore every idiot?

1.19.18  7:32 am   sometimes i feel like all of your songs are connected, in one way or another. i feel as if you wished you werent trapped in this comedian bubble

      and your music was actually taken seriously and not just as a joke.

     the visuals that accompany your videos are merely funny and maybe you dont to be seen as a musician that isnt taken seriously because of their sense of humour, and "i want to be a movie star" is about you wanting to be famous for somthjng that IS taken seriously,

      and la de da de da de da de day oh is about you reminiscing on the past when you were taken legitimately and life was all good and you didnt have to feel the pressure of people always demanding videos...

     

but hey, thats just a theory,

A GAME THEORY
1.19.18  5:41 am   What's your biggest secret??
1.19.18  5:31 am   Does having an audience impact your creative decisions?
1.19.18  5:01 am   Bill, how do you manage to put your incoherent lyrics together?

1.19.18  3:31 am   Is it hard to make original songs these days?

     Most of your songs sound similar, just sayin'
1.19.18  2:39 am   are cats real
1.19.18  2:38 am   whats your favorite atomic element
1.19.18  2:34 am   did you always know you would be a musician?
1.19.18  1:32 am   what is that one thing that must be set right to make the world a better place?
1.19.18  12:58 am   will "i'm crazy / it's raining" make it onto your spotify?

1.19.18  12:56 am   Can u do a studio tour

this

1.19.18  12:43 am   when do you plan on getting a better quality camera to use in those videos where you do show yourself in?

     what camera do you use now?
1.19.18  12:34 am   the windmill line in your new song seems a little out of place to me, so i was just wondering what the inspiration behind that line was?

1.19.18  12:32 am   I'm in college and everyone wants me to write "academically" and it's annoying because there are all these rules in academic writing that usually makes things you are trying to say even MORE vague.

      can you tell all the academic people that it's not fair to make everyone else learn their language when it's THEIR jobs to make things easy for us dumb, unsophisticated folks to understand?
1.19.18  12:09 am   what disappoints you

1.18.18  11:46 pm   If you could collaborate with anyone ever to make a song with, who would you want to do it with? It feels weird to have with in a sentence twice, but I think I'm sticking with it. wait
1.18.18  11:13 pm   Do you like me as a friend?

1.18.18  11:06 pm   Hey bill, I know an accomplished composer/songwriter with a couple number ones. It'd be dope if you guys collaborated. He thinks your music is the raddest.

Would you be interested?
1.18.18  11:04 pm   have you figured out what icy james is yet?

1.18.18  10:59 pm   do you read poetry, bill?

      are your lyrics poetry?

     what is poetry?

     is this question poetry??
1.18.18  9:54 pm   How much an hour does it cost to rent you out as a friend?

1.18.18  9:52 pm   Do you have to force yourself to create

     or does it feel natural to you?
1.18.18  9:45 pm   If my mom calls me a mistake should I take that as a compliment.

1.18.18  9:33 pm   That was a great video. Congrats! Your dedication and the way you make stuff is nearly as amazing as the stuff you make. What's next? If you need any kind of humanly doable help, just shout, I'm right at the corner.
1.18.18  9:29 pm   Have you ever been recognized on the streets only by your voice?
